Uses of Interface
io.atomix.catalyst.serializer.TypeSerializerFactory

  • Packages that use TypeSerializerFactory 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.catalyst.serializer
    Provides a fast serialization framework built on the Buffer abstraction.

    • Uses of TypeSerializerFactory in io.atomix.catalyst.serializer

      Classes in io.atomix.catalyst.serializer that implement TypeSerializerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultTypeSerializerFactory
      Default serializer factory.
      Methods in io.atomix.catalyst.serializer that return TypeSerializerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TypeSerializerFactory SerializerRegistry.lookup(Class<?> type)
      Looks up the serializer for the given class else null if no serializer is registered for the type.
      Methods in io.atomix.catalyst.serializer with parameters of type TypeSerializerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SerializerRegistry SerializerRegistry.register(Class<?> type, TypeSerializerFactory factory)
      Registers a serializer for the given class.
      Serializer Serializer.register(Class<?> type, TypeSerializerFactory factory)
      Registers a type serializer factory.
      SerializerRegistry SerializerRegistry.register(Class<?> type, TypeSerializerFactory factory, int id)
      Registers the given class for serialization.
      Serializer Serializer.register(Class<?> type, TypeSerializerFactory factory, int id)
      Registers a type serializer with an identifier.
